actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend title VII of the Civil Rights Act of 1964 to extend the equal opportunity in employment provisions to prohibit employment discrimination against the handicapped.
short_title: Prevention of Employment Discrimination Against the Handicapped Act

summary.text: Prevention of Employment Discrimination against the Handicapped Act - Amends the Civil Rights Act of 1964 to include as an unlawful employment practice discrimination on the basis of handicap.

titles.title: Prevention of Employment Discrimination Against the Handicapped Act
A bill to amend title VII of the Civil Rights Act of 1964 to extend the equal opportunity in employment provisions to prohibit employment discrimination against the handicapped.
